content: Tomorrow (Thursday), 09:00 in The Richard, come and join a talk about teaming up the best of XDS with the best of FHIR - MHD, on-demand documents and more.

I would love to... Can you mention the new MHDS profile. I am the editor and invite input. IHE is building this now, there will be a two phase public comment with the first phase in January. Current draft is 70% and can be found https://github.com/IHE/IT-Infrastructure/tree/master/MHDS
